<a id="overview"></a>

## 2. OVERVIEW

Debugged and fixed a hero video card flickering issue on mobile devices for anobel.com. The root cause was identified as CSS transitions (0.3s opacity/visibility) being too slow during momentum scroll, causing IntersectionObserver to trigger rapid play/pause cycles that restarted transitions before completion. Solution implemented disables transitions on touch devices via media queries and adds JavaScript debouncing for viewport pause events.

**Key Outcomes**:
- Debugged and fixed a hero video card flickering issue on mobile devices for anobel.com. The root...
- Decision: Use CSS media query `@media (hover: none), (pointer: coarse)` to targe
- Decision: Add 150ms debounce for viewport pause in JavaScript because momentum s
- Decision: Set inline `transition: none` on mobile via JavaScript because CSS spe
- Decision: Add delayed visibility:hidden on desktop (300ms) because the fade-out
- Technical Implementation Details

**Key Files:**

| **File**                                          | **Description**                     |
| :------------------------------------------------ | :---------------------------------- |
| `webflow-html/css/video_background_hls.css`       | File modified (description pending) |
| `webflow-html/css/video_background_hover_hls.css` | File modified (description pending) |
| `webflow-html/js/video_background_hls_hover.js`   | File modified (description pending) |

<!-- /ANCHOR_EXAMPLE:summary-session-1769964075723-dnnkwucqn-005-anobel.com -->

<!-- ANCHOR_EXAMPLE:detailed-changes-session-1769964075723-dnnkwucqn-005-anobel.com -->
<a id="detailed-changes"></a>

## 3. DETAILED CHANGES

<!-- ANCHOR_EXAMPLE:implementation-hero-video-card-flickering-8b803a2e-session-1769964075723-dnnkwucqn -->
### FEATURE: Debugged and fixed a hero video card flickering issue on mobile devices for anobel.com. The root...

Debugged and fixed a hero video card flickering issue on mobile devices for anobel.com. The root cause was identified as CSS transitions (0.3s opacity/visibility) being too slow during momentum scroll, causing IntersectionObserver to trigger rapid play/pause cycles that restarted transitions before completion. Solution implemented disables transitions on touch devices via media queries and adds JavaScript debouncing for viewport pause events.

**Details:** hero flicker | mobile scroll flickering | video thumbnail flicker | IntersectionObserver momentum scroll | CSS transition mobile | opacity transition touch device | video card flicker | hover none pointer coarse | debounce viewport pause | HLS video mobile
<!-- /ANCHOR_EXAMPLE:implementation-hero-video-card-flickering-8b803a2e-session-1769964075723-dnnkwucqn -->

<!-- ANCHOR_EXAMPLE:implementation-technical-implementation-details-41c0e186-session-1769964075723-dnnkwucqn -->
### IMPLEMENTATION: Technical Implementation Details

rootCause: CSS transition `transition: opacity 0.3s linear, visibility 0.3s linear` on `.video--thumbnail` elements was too slow. During momentum scroll, IntersectionObserver triggers rapid state changes (play/pause cycles). The 0.3s transition restarts before completing, causing visible flickering.; solution: Three-part fix: (1) CSS media query `@media (hover: none), (pointer: coarse)` to disable transitions on touch devices in video_background_hls.css and video_background_hover_hls.css, (2) JavaScript inline `transition: none` on mobile detected via get_mobile_autoplay(), (3) 150ms debounce for viewport pause and delayed visibility:hidden on desktop; patterns: ["Touch device detection via CSS media queries rather than viewport width","Debouncing rapid IntersectionObserver callbacks during scroll","Separating mobile and desktop transition behavior","Inline style override for dynamic state management"]

<!-- /ANCHOR_EXAMPLE:implementation-technical-implementation-details-41c0e186-session-1769964075723-dnnkwucqn -->

<!-- /ANCHOR_EXAMPLE:detailed-changes-session-1769964075723-dnnkwucqn-005-anobel.com -->

## 4. DECISIONS

<!-- ANCHOR_EXAMPLE:decision-css-media-query-media-4dc98dd5-session-1769964075723-dnnkwucqn -->
### Decision 1: Decision: Use CSS media query `@media (hover: none), (pointer: coarse)` to target touch devices because this accurately detects devices without hover capability rather than relying on viewport width

**Context**: Decision: Use CSS media query `@media (hover: none), (pointer: coarse)` to target touch devices because this accurately detects devices without hover capability rather than relying on viewport width

**Timestamp**: 2026-02-01T17:41:15Z

**Importance**: medium

#### Options Considered

1. **Chosen Approach**
   Decision: Use CSS media query `@media (hover: none), (pointer: coarse)` to target touch devices because this accurately detects devices without hover capability rather than relying on viewport width

#### Chosen Approach

**Selected**: Chosen Approach

**Rationale**: Decision: Use CSS media query `@media (hover: none), (pointer: coarse)` to target touch devices because this accurately detects devices without hover capability rather than relying on viewport width

#### Trade-offs

**Confidence**: 80%

| Scenario            | Symptoms                          | Recovery Action                                         |

| Incomplete Handover | Missing continuation context      | Review CONTINUE SESSION section above                   |
| Dedup Collision     | Wrong memory surfaced             | Check `fingerprint_hash` for conflicts                  |

### Diagnostic Commands

```bash
# Check memory index health
node .opencode/skill/system-spec-kit/mcp_server/lib/storage/checkpoints.js --status

# List memories for this spec folder

# Verify memory file integrity

# Check for orphaned memories

# Force re-index of this spec folder
node .opencode/skill/system-spec-kit/scripts/memory/generate-context.js 005-anobel.com --force
```
